org.accada.epcis.repository
Class EventFieldExtension

java.lang.Object
  org.accada.epcis.repository.EventFieldExtension

public class EventFieldExtension
extends java.lang.Object

A simple representation for an event field extension.

Author:
Marco Steybe

Constructor Detail

EventFieldExtension

public EventFieldExtension(java.lang.String prefix,
                           java.lang.String namespace,
                           java.lang.String localname,
                           java.lang.String value)
Constructs a new EventFieldExtension from the parameters. The value will be parsed to see if it represents an integer, a float, a date, or a string.

Parameters:
prefix - The prefix of the event field.
namespace - The namespace for the prefix.
localname - The localname (tag name) of the event field.
value - The value of the event field.
